newsitem.title: USA: Concentra sees Q4 eps loss of $0.80.
newsitem.headline: Concentra sees Q4 eps loss of $0.80.

text.p: Concentra Corp said Monday it expects a loss for fourth-quarter earnings of about $0.80 per share compared with net income of $0.15 per share for the same period lst year.
The First Call consensus estimate for the quarter is $0.21 per share.

For the fiscal year ending March 31, earnings are expected to be about $0.53 per share, compared with net income of $0.01 per share last year, on revenues of about $24.4 million, up from last year's revenues of $20.7 million.
Revenues for the fourth quarter are expected to be about $4.4 million compared with $6.8 million last year, the company said.
Concentra said the unexpected earnings losses were due to purchasing delays by several "significant" customers.
The company plans to post fourth-quarter and fiscal year-end results during the week of May 5.
